com.matrixone.apps.domain.util
Class MailUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.matrixone.apps.domain.util.MailUtil

public class MailUtil
extends java.lang.Object

The MailUtil class implements utility mail methods used by other classes in the AEF.

Version:
9.5.0.0 - Copyright (c) 2002, MatrixOne, Inc.

sendMessage

public static void sendMessage(Context context,
                               StringList toList,
                               StringList ccList,
                               StringList bccList,
                               java.lang.String subject,
                               java.lang.String message,
                               StringList objectIdList)
                        throws FrameworkException
Sends an icon mail notification to the specified users.

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
toList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the toList of users to notify
ccList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the ccList of users to notify
bccList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the bccList of users to notify
subject - the notification subject
message - the notification message
objectIdList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the list of objects to send with the notification
Throws:
FrameworkException - if the operation fails
Since:
AEF 9.5.0.0

sendNotification

public static void sendNotification(Context context,
                                    StringList toList,
                                    StringList ccList,
                                    StringList bccList,
                                    java.lang.String subjectKey,
                                    java.lang.String[] subjectKeys,
                                    java.lang.String[] subjectValues,
                                    java.lang.String messageKey,
                                    java.lang.String[] messageKeys,
                                    java.lang.String[] messageValues,
                                    StringList objectIdList,
                                    java.lang.String companyName)
                             throws FrameworkException
Sends an icon mail notification to the specified users.

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
toList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the to list of users to notify
ccList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the cc list of users to notify
bccList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the bcc list of users to notify
subjectKey - the notification subject key
subjectKeys - an array of subject place holder keys
subjectValues - an array of subject place holder values
messageKey - the notification message key
messageKeys - an array of message place holder keys
messageValues - an array of message place holder values
objectIdList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the list of objects to send with the notification
companyName - used for company-based messages
Throws:
FrameworkException - if the operation fails
Since:
AEF 9.5.1.0

sendNotification

public static void sendNotification(Context context,
                                    StringList toList,
                                    StringList ccList,
                                    StringList bccList,
                                    java.lang.String subjectKey,
                                    java.lang.String[] subjectKeys,
                                    java.lang.String[] subjectValues,
                                    java.lang.String messageKey,
                                    java.lang.String[] messageKeys,
                                    java.lang.String[] messageValues,
                                    StringList objectIdList,
                                    java.lang.String companyName,
                                    java.lang.String basePropFileName)
                             throws FrameworkException
Sends an icon mail notification to the specified users.

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
toList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the to list of users to notify
ccList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the cc list of users to notify
bccList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the bcc list of users to notify
subjectKey - the notification subject key
subjectKeys - an array of subject place holder keys
subjectValues - an array of subject place holder values
messageKey - the notification message key
messageKeys - an array of message place holder keys
messageValues - an array of message place holder values
objectIdList - the eMatrix StringList object that holds the list of objects to send with the notification
companyName - used for company-based messages
basePropFileName - base name of property file for messages (i.e. emxFrameworkStringResource)
Throws:
FrameworkException - if the operation fails
Since:
AEF 10.0.0.0
